channel.title: CVE Feed for Baker Hughes - Bently Nevada -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Baker Hughes - Bently Nevada -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-36857|2023-10-18T23:27:31.794Z -- baker%20hughes%20-%20bently%20nevada -- bently%20nevada%203500%20system
item.description:
Baker Hughes – Bently Nevada 3500 System TDI Firmware version 5.05
contains a replay vulnerability which could allow an attacker to
replay older captured packets of traffic to the device to gain access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34437|2023-10-18T23:25:25.969Z -- baker%20hughes%20-%20bently%20nevada -- bently%20nevada%203500%20system
item.description:
Baker Hughes – Bently Nevada 3500 System TDI Firmware version 5.05
contains a vulnerability in their password retrieval functionality which could allow an attacker to access passwords stored on the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-34441|2023-10-18T23:22:29.808Z -- baker%20hughes%20-%20bently%20nevada -- bently%20nevada%203500%20system
item.description:
Baker Hughes – Bently Nevada 3500 System TDI Firmware version 5.05
contains a cleartext transmission vulnerability which could allow an attacker to
steal the authentication secret from communication traffic to the device and reuse it for arbitrary requests.
